item.description:
We'll see a great movie, Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil, and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start at times to clearly see how types are showing up in the movie, including subtypes. Learn from each other, as well as keen insights by the master movie Enneagram master. Lots of fun. Dinner and snacks provided. So far people have loved every movie attended. 6 seen so far.

cancel Add details/images No details, yet

 

Dinner 7:30-8:15

Movie starts at 8:15

Dinner and snacks served.

$20.

Herb Pearce is a leading expert on the Enneagram, having taught it for over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living, both available from him. He is a relationship coach and therapist, team development trainer in organizations and teaches the Enneagram throughout New England and other parts of the US.

www.herbpearce.com

herb@herbpearce.com

781 648 3737
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies
